install.description: A Simple Gallery module for Jom Webplayer.

param.name: link
param.label: Player Page URL
param.description: Video Player page to be loaded onClicking the Thumbnail

param.name: categories
param.label: Select Categories
param.description: Select category of videos to be displayed in the Video Gallery

param.name: rows
param.label: No. of Rows
param.description: Number of rows in the Gallery

param.name: columns
param.label: No. of Columns
param.description: Number of columns in the Gallery

param.name: limit
param.label: Display Limit
param.description: Maximum no. of Videos / Category to be displayed

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A Suffix to be applied to the CSS class of the Module.This allows for individual Module Styling.

field.name: link
field.label: Player Page URL
field.description: Video Player page to be loaded onClicking the Thumbnail

field.name: categories
field.label: Select Categories
field.description: Select category of videos to be displayed in the Video Gallery
field.query: select id, name from #__jomwebplayer_category where published=1 order by name ASC

field.name: rows
field.label: No. of Rows
field.description: Number of rows in the Gallery

field.name: columns
field.label: No. of Columns
field.description: Number of columns in the Gallery

field.name: limit
field.label: Display Limit
field.description: Maximum no. of Videos / Category to be displayed

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A Suffix to be applied to the CSS class of the Module.This allows for individual Module Styling.
